paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant V122I, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.demographics: 2 patients with hereditary ATTR, specific demographics not detailed

individual_records.phenotype_details: hereditary ATTR associated with V122I variant
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Of the 10 ATTR patients, 8 were wild type, and 2 had hereditary ATTR associated with the V122I variant.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Of the 10 ATTR patients, 8 were wild type, and 2 had hereditary ATTR associated with the V122I variant.

functional_data.summary: The V122I variant is associated with hereditary ATTR amyloidosis.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the two reported cases.
variants.additional_notes: No specific functional assays or population frequency data were provided.
key_quotes: Of the 10 ATTR patients, 8 were wild type, and 2 had hereditary ATTR associated with the V122I variant.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data is based on the presence of the V122I variant in the TTR gene.
